qas.question: What drug company has a major presence in Tucson?
How many optics-related companies are in Tucson?
What do the 'Optics Valley' companies do?

answers.text: design and manufacture of optics and optoelectronics systems

qas.question: What accounting software company has a major presence in Tucson?

context: The City of Tucson, Pima County, the State of Arizona, and the private sector have all made commitments to create a growing, healthy economy[citation needed] with advanced technology industry sectors as its foundation. Raytheon Missile Systems (formerly <a0_0>Hughes Aircraft Co.<a0_0/>), Texas Instruments, IBM, <a4_0>Intuit Inc.<a4_0/>, Universal Avionics, Honeywell Aerospace, Sunquest Information Systems, <a1_0>Sanofi-Aventis<a1_0/>, Ventana Medical Systems, Inc., and Bombardier Aerospace all have a significant presence in Tucson. Roughly <a2_0>150<a2_0/> Tucson companies are involved in the <a3_0>design and manufacture of optics and optoelectronics systems<a3_0/>, earning Tucson the nickname "Optics Valley".
